org.escoladeltreball.ulisesmap.adapters

Class ImageDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
      • org.escoladeltreball.ulisesmap.adapters.ImageDownloader

  • public class ImageDownloader
extends
    ImageDownloader Asynchronously download image from a url using a WeakReference to ensure that the AsyncTask does not prevent the ImageView and anything it references from being garbage collected. Use a ProgressBar to warn a user that image is downloading right now. For guarantee that ImageView is still around when the task finished reference to task itself is saved in AsyncDrawable and after checked in onPostExecute()
